snippet: A newspaper listing of abandoned Citibank accounts includes two that belonged to the philanthropist Brooke Astor, who died in 2007 and left an estate of more than $100 million.
abstract: Newspaper listing of abandoned Citibank accounts includes two that belonged to the philanthropist Brooke Astor, who died in 2007 and left an estate of more than $100 million; how much the abandoned accounts are worth will remain a secret, as required by law, until someone proves entitled to the money.
lead_paragraph: A newspaper listing of abandoned Citibank accounts includes two that belonged to the philanthropist Brooke Astor, who died in 2007 and left an estate of more than $100 million.

headline.seo: Abandoned Brooke Astor Bank Accounts Surface in Ad
headline.main: Abandoned Bank Accounts of Brooke Astor’s Surface, Their Value a Secret
headline.print_headline: Abandoned Bank Accounts of Brooke Astor’s Surface, Their Value a Secret
